channel.title: How to make me admin (614)
channel.description: hey guys i was just wondering how do i makemyslef admin. im using the LegacyRSPS source and when i go to saved games my files are in ser. files. please help. they got alot of weird symbols and coding

item.title: How to make me admin (614)
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

its only player rights of 0, for player, 1, for player moderator, and 2, for administrator (in runescape these would be the JMods)

Read full topic

item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

He means on a 614 idiot, not a 317… As far as the question, i would try using notepad++, u might be able to not see the incoding. Otherwise, just make a command for it

item.title: How to make me admin (614)
item.dc:creator: @Number_two Number_two
item.description:
@Number_two wrote:

il tell you how…

Step1. open your source
Step2. open your data
step3. open your characters
Step4. Click on your characters name an open it with Notepad or somthing…
[Your Should see Something Like this] [The Red is What you need to Change]
[ACCOUNT]
character-username = User
character-password = User

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3364
character-posy = 3342
character-rights = 3
crystal-bow-shots = 0
VLS-hits = 0

Change Character Rights

0=normal 1=mod 2=admin 3=co-owner 4=Donar 5=Owner

Read full topic
